Description: Spacious 3 bed 2.5 bath townhouse located in the heart of South Boston. THIS UNIT COMES WITH 2 PARKING SPACES INCLUDED IN THE PRICE OF RENT!! Spacious bedrooms with ample closest space in each as well as additional storage. This townhouse has in unit laundry located in the basement. Hardwood flooring in the commodious living room as well as large windows, allowing for natural light to shine through. A private deck located in the rear of the house with built in seating. Less than 1000 ft. to W. Broadway Street.
